mapper.sql: cd.ClassesDelivery_Id, cd.SaleNumber, cd.Total, cd.DeliveryTime, cd.DeliveryType, cd.ClassesDelivery_Count, cd.Approval, cd.AppName, cd.AppTime, cd.Revoke_AppName, cd.Revoke_AppTime, cd.AddName, cd.UpdateName, cd.UpdateTime, cd.DeleteName,cd.DeleteTime, cd.TimeLiness, cd.Emp_Id, cd.Book_Id, cd.Classes_Id
mapper.select: select ,e.Emp_Name,b.BookName,c.Classes_Name from classesdelivery cd inner join emp e on e.Emp_Id=cd.Emp_Id inner join book b on b.Book_Id=cd.Book_Id inner join classes c on c.Classes_Id=cd.Classes_Id where cd.ClassesDelivery_Id = #{classesdeliveryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TimeLiness=0

select ,e.Emp_Name,b.BookName,c.Classes_Name from classesdelivery cd inner join emp e on e.Emp_Id=cd.Emp_Id inner join book b on b.Book_Id=cd.Book_Id inner join classes c on c.Classes_Id=cd.Classes_Id where cd.TimeLiness=0 and cd.Approval=#{param1} and (e.Emp_Name like #{param2} or b.BookName like #{param2} or c.Classes_Name like #{param2})
mapper.insert: insert into classesdelivery (SaleNumber, Total, DeliveryType, ClassesDelivery_Count,UpdateName,UpdateTime, AppName, AppTime, Revoke_AppName, Revoke_AppTime, AddName, DeleteName, DeleteTime,Emp_Id, Book_Id, Classes_Id) values (#{salenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliverytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classesdeliveryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{revokeAppname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revokeApptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update classesdelivery
SaleNumber = #{salenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DeliveryTime = #{deliverytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DeliveryType = #{deliverytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClassesDelivery_Count = #{classesdeliveryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Approval = #{approval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AppName = #{appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppTime = #{apptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Revoke_AppName = #{revokeAppname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Revoke_AppTime = #{revokeApptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Emp_Id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Book_Id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Classes_Id = #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ClassesDelivery_Id = #{classesdeliveryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
